portfolioDictionary.title:
Project#0000
Shopping Cart WebApp
description:
As a javascript initiation, this project was focused on converting what we learned about code with real web app implications for the first time.

The challenge was to create a shop app with the following possibilities:

-Adding and removing items to and from the cart.

-Checking totals and sub totals per multiple instances of a same item.

Memory Card Flip Game
description: Project worked on during javascript training at Technifutur training center

bio:
'A man of focus, commitment, and sheer will !'

As I was getting bored of the monotonous routine I had stuck myself into, I looked at my computer, a companion that had always been there for distraction and vain hobbies, and realised it was time I put to profit this proficiency I had built over the years using numeric tools.

Coming from 'on-the-field' jobs, having dealt with many difficult emergency situations, I can confidently affirm that I'm immune to the 'deadline stress'
